subject: Faulty Throttle Pedal (order no. SSN1776)
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I am reaching out regarding my throttle simsonn pro x ultra pedal which
seems to be faulty, it is recognized by the Simsonn software (which has
been updated) but does not detect any pedal input. I checked to see if it
was an EMI issue, it is not. I also disconnected everything and reconnected
it, still doesn’t work. Finally, I swapped the connection of the throttle
and clutch to the box to see if the box was the issue, but when I connect
my throttle to the clutch, the clutch’s input is not recognized. Likewise,
with the clutch connected tit the throttle position, the clutch is
recognized as a throttle. I want to see what we can do to resolve this, can
I be sent a replacement throttle pedal? These pedals are less than a month
old, and they have not gotten much use.

Thank you,
Luis D Prieto

conversations.body_text: Hi Luis Prieto,  Please check if the throttle pressure plate has broken due to the travel being adjusted too short.

Hello,

I just checked, and it is exactly that.

Is there any way that I could be shipped a replacement plate? Is it
replaceable?

Thank you for the quick and amazing customer service.

Hi Luis Prieto,  Replacing this part requires some hands-on skills. Would you be comfortable doing it yourself? We can provide a tutorial video, the improved replacement part, and the necessary wrench tools.
Yes, I’m fairly handy. I can replace it myself. I appreciate it!
Hi Luis Prieto,    Okay, we've reissued it for you and wish you all the best!
